description: Archimedes was one of the greatest of Greece's philosophers and scientists.  Can enchant shields only.
name: Essence of Archimedes' Mirror

description: Artemis, the Greek goddess of the hunt, is renowned for her skill with the bow.  Can enchant bows only.
name: Essence of Artemis' Bowstring

description: The drink of Dionysus, Greek god of wine and revelry, is a potent brew indeed.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
name: Essence of Dionysus' Wineskin

description: The Golden Fleece, sought after by Jason and his Argonauts, is rumored to hold great power as well as great beauty.  Can enchant torso armor only.
name: Essence of the Golden Fleece

description: Hecate is a mysterious Greek goddess associated with the moon, childbirth, and magic.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
name: Essence of Hecate's Crescent

description: Herakles was the strongest of all the Greek heroes.  Can enchant all armor.
name: Essence of Herakles' Might

description: Hermes the Messenger is the swiftest of the Greek gods.  He is known for his iconic winged sandals.  Can enchant leg armor only.
name: Essence of Hermes' Sandal

description: Prometheus, son of the titan Iapetus, gave the gift of fire to mankind.  Can enchant all weapons.
name: Essence of Prometheus' Flame

description: Achilles was the greatest of all the Greek warriors of the Trojan War.  His strength and speed in battle were legendary.  Can enchant all weapons.
name: Essence of the Valor of Achilles

description: Zeus is the mightiest of the gods of Olympus.  The thunderbolt is his weapon and symbol.  Can enchant all weapons.
name: Essence of Zeus' Thunderbolt

description: Amun-Ra, ruler of the sun, is the greatest of the Egyptian gods.  Can enchant all armor.
name: Essence of Amun-Ra's Glory

description: Isis is queen of the Egyptian gods.  Her symbol, the ankh, is associated with healing and immortality.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
name: Essence of the Ankh of Isis

description: Anubis, a jackal-headed god, is ruler of the Egyptian underworld.  Can enchant all weapons.

properties.offensiveLifeLeech: 2% of Attack damage converted to Health
4% of Attack damage converted to Health
6% of Attack damage converted to Health

name: Essence of Anubis' Wrath

description: The Djed is the backbone of Osiris, lord of the dead.  Can enchant all weapons.
name: Essence of the Djed of Osiris

description: Set is the Egyptian god of evil.  In an attempt to take control of the throne of the gods, Set turned on his brother Osiris, brutally hacking the latter's body apart and scattering the pieces across the land.  Can enchant all armor.
name: Essence of Set's Betrayal

description: The Udjat is the eye of Horus, hawk-headed god of the sky.  It symbolizes protection and power.  Can enchant all armor.
name: Essence of the Udjat of Horus

description: Hammurabi, king of Babylon, was revered for bringing justice to his people with his code of laws.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
name: Essence of the Code of Hammurabi

description: The Dragon-Kings are the masters of water in China.  Ocean, rain, lake, and river - all are theirs to command.  Can enchant all armor.
name: Essence of the Domain of the Dragon-Kings

description: True to the tenets of Taoism, even Guan-Yu, the Taoist god of war, only fights when all other options have been exhausted.  Can enchant torso armor only.
name: Essence of Guan-Yu's Grace

description: The Jade Emperor is the ruler of the Chinese gods.  He is a contemplative deity who rarely interferes with the affairs of god or man.  Can enchant all armor.
name: Essence of the Jade Emperor's Serenity

description: Li-Nezha, a Chinese trickster god, is as nimble as he is crafty.  Can enchant all armor.
name: Essence of Li-Nezha's Guile

description: The Monkey King, the most mischievous of all the Chinese gods, is also one of the most powerful.  His cunning has lured many an unwary foe to do his bidding.  Can enchant rings and amulets.
name: Essence of the Monkey King's Trickery

description: Shen-Nong is the Chinese god of plants and medicine. He is a master of herbs - and not all are meant to cure.  Can enchant all weapons.
name: Essence of Shen-Nong's Dark Medicine

description: Yen-Lo-Wang is a god of Death and the ruler of Feng-Du, the Chinese Hell.  Can enchant all weapons.
name: Essence of Yen-Lo-Wang's Bloodletting

description: Hollow fang of a Cave Bat.  Can enhance all weapons.
name: Bat Fang

description: Toughened hide of a wild boar.  Can enhance all armor.
name: Boar Hide

description: High quality feathers.  Can enhance all armor.
name: Pristine Plumage

description: A large turtle shell.  Can enhance shields only.
name: Turtle Shell

description: A scrap of skin from a Desert Hag.  Can enhance all armor.
name: Hag's Skin

description: A long, sharp claw.  Can enhance all weapons.
name: Lupine Claw

description: A disgusting glob of pus, blood, and bile.  Can enhance rings and amulets.
name: Vile Ichor

description: Claw of a Peng.  Can enhance all weapons.
name: Peng Claw

description: Sharp, jagged tooth torn from a Raptor's mouth.  Can enhance amulets only.
name: Raptor Tooth

description: The razor-sharp claw of a Saber Lion.  Can enhance all weapons.
name: Saber Claw

description: A lump of dense plant matter.  Can enhance all armor.
name: Viny Growth

description: The thick, coarse pelt of the Yeti.  Can enhance all armor.
name: Yeti Fur

description: The dark blood of a fallen demon.  Can enhance rings and amulets.
name: Demon's Blood

description: Feathers from a carrion bird.  Can enhance all armor.
name: Diseased Plumage

description: The intricate inner workings of an automaton.  Can enhance torso armor only.
name: Mechanical Parts

description: The thick outer shell of an insectoid monster.  Can enhance shields only.
name: Rigid Carapace

description: A wispy, glowing substance.  Can enhance rings and amulets.
name: Spectral Matter

description: Contains a deadly poison.  Can enhance all weapons.
name: Venom Sac

description: Thanatos, the incarnation of death, carries a sword with the power to rend the very souls of mere mortals.  Can enchant all weapons.
name: Essence of the Blade of Thanatos

description: In the deepest pits of the underworld lies Tartarus.  Cold as the grave and swathed in darkness, it is here that punishment is meted out for those mortals foolish enough to oppose the will of the gods.  Can enchant all weapons.
name: Essence of the Chill of Tartarus

description: Although not as strong or swift as the other heroes of legend, Odysseus' formidable guile made him a match for any foe.  Can enchant head armor only.
name: Essence of the Cunning of Odysseus

description: Numbered among the greatest of the heroes of the Trojan war, Ajax was known not only for the strength of his arm, but even more for his indomitable spirit.  Can enchant all armor.
name: Essence of the Iron Will of Ajax

description: Persephone, favored daughter of the earth goddess Demeter, was forced into marriage with Hades.  She now shares rule of the underworld, yet it brings her only sorrow.  Can enchant all jewelry.
name: Essence of Persephone's Tears

description: Ares, the Greek god of war, is venerated and feared in equal measure.  He is cruel, vengeful, and nearly mad - only a fool would risk his wrath.  Can enchant armbands and bracelets.
name: Essence of the Rage of Ares

description: Hector, prince of Troy, was renowned for his noble spirit and steadfast nature.  He fell defending his homeland, mourned even by his enemies.  Can enchant all shields.
name: Essence of the Shade of Hector

description: Thanatos, the incarnation of death, carries a sword with the power to rend the very souls of mere mortals.  Can enchant all weapons.
name: Embodiment of the Blade of Thanatos

description: Ares, the Greek god of war, is venerated and feared in equal measure.  He is cruel, vengeful, and nearly mad - only a fool would risk his wrath.  Can enchant armbands and bracelets.
name: Incarnation of the Rage of Ares

description: Hector, prince of Troy, was renowned for his noble spirit and steadfast nature.  He fell defending his homeland, mourned even by his enemies.  Can enchant all shields.
name: Incarnation of the Shade of Hector

description: A splinter from one of the Crystals of Erebus, the source of Hades' power in the world of the living.  Can enhance head armor only.
name: Crystal of Erebus

description: A sticky mass of webbing pulled from an Albino Spider abdomen.  Can enhance all armor.
name: Albino Spider Web

description: Blood drained from a Fury's still-beating heart.  Can enhance all weapons.
name: Fury's Heartblood

description: A patch of rough, durable skin ripped from the flesh of a Hydradon.  Can enhance all armor.
name: Hydradon Hide

description: The jagged shell of a Karkinos.  Can enhance shields.
name: Spiny Shell

description: The agonized soul of a creature of darkness.  Can enhance all jewelry.
name: Tortured Soul

description: A splinter from one of the Crystals of Erebus, the source of Hades' power in the world of the living.  Can enhance head armor only.
name: Epic Crystal of Erebus

description: A sticky mass of webbing pulled from an Albino Spider abdomen.  Can enhance all armor.
name: Epic Albino Spider Web

description: Blood drained from a Fury's still-beating heart.  Can enhance all weapons.
name: Epic Fury's Heartblood

description: A patch of rough, durable skin ripped from the flesh of a Hydradon.  Can enhance all armor.
name: Epic Hydradon Hide

description: The jagged shell of a Karkinos.  Can enhance shields.
name: Epic Spiny Shell

description: The agonized soul of a creature of darkness.  Can enhance all jewelry.
name: Epic Tortured Soul

description: A splinter from one of the Crystals of Erebus, the source of Hades' power in the world of the living.  Can enhance head armor only.
name: Legendary Crystal of Erebus

description: A sticky mass of webbing pulled from an Albino Spider abdomen.  Can enhance all armor.
name: Legendary Albino Spider Web

description: Blood drained from a Fury's still-beating heart.  Can enhance all weapons.
name: Legendary Fury's Heartblood

description: A patch of rough, durable skin ripped from the flesh of a Hydradon.  Can enhance all armor.
name: Legendary Hydradon Hide

description: The jagged shell of a Karkinos.  Can enhance shields.
name: Legendary Spiny Shell

description: The agonized soul of a creature of darkness.  Can enhance all jewelry.
name: Legendary Tortured Soul

description: Opens a conduit of pure energy that flows from the celestial planes into the caster, granting them improved control over their mystical powers.
name: Scroll of Arcane Power

description: Calls upon a mighty Cyclops to do the caster's bidding.  Due to the iron will of the Cyclops, however, mastery of this fearsome being can only be held for a short time.
name: Scroll of the Cyclops

description: Calls on the power of the skies to rain fury upon nearby enemies.
name: Scroll of the Sky's Rage

description: Creates a field of energy that weakens the defenses of enemies caught inside.
name: Scroll of Vulnerability

description: Inspires the caster, greatly improving their offensive capabilities in melee combat.
name: Scroll of the Warrior's Song

description: Sends a devastating flurry of blades in all directions.
name: Scroll of the Breaking Wheel

description: Creates a maelstrom of destructive power around the caster.
name: Scroll of the Crushing Vortex

description: Encases the caster in a mystic shield that absorbs damage from all elemental attacks.
name: Scroll of Elemental Shielding

description: Blasts surrounding enemies with a wave of energy that saps their physical strength, greatly reducing their ability to deal damage with most weapons.
name: Scroll of Frailty

description: Fills the caster with incredible fury, increasing their speed and the damage of their attacks.
name: Scroll of Frenzy

description: Sends a blast of bitter cold air out from the caster's location.
name: Scroll of the Ice Nova

description: Summons a pair of powerful Harpy witches.  Using fierce lightning attacks, these fearsome beasts devastate enemies from a distance.
name: Scroll of the Storm Witches

description: Grants an aura which improves both the armor and attack strength of the caster and their allies.
name: Scroll of the Stalwart Alliance

description: Strengthens the will of the caster, greatly improving their ability to withstand damage in battle.
name: Scroll of Unbroken Fortitude

description: Summons a mighty Djinn spellcaster.  Though powerful in war, the Djinn is also valuable for the mystical enhancements it provides for the caster and their allies.
name: Greater Scroll of the Djinn

description: Sends shockwaves of force through the surrounding ground, damaging and stunning any nearby enemies.
name: Greater Scroll of the Earthquake

description: Raises a force of flame-enchanted skeletal warriors to do the caster's bidding.
name: Greater Scroll of the Necromancer

description: Lays down a field of vampiric energy.  The life force of any enemies who cross into this field will be ripped from their souls and transferred to the caster.
name: Greater Scroll of Vampirism

description: Lashes out in fiery retaliation each time the caster is struck by a melee attack.
name: Greater Scroll of Vengeance

description: Sends a devastating flurry of blades in all directions.
name: Greater Scroll of the Breaking Wheel

description: Creates a maelstrom of destructive power around the caster.
name: Greater Scroll of the Crushing Vortex

description: Encases the caster in a mystic shield that absorbs damage from all elemental attacks.
name: Greater Scroll of Elemental Shielding

description: Blasts surrounding enemies with a wave of energy that saps their physical strength, greatly reducing their ability to deal damage with most weapons.
name: Greater Scroll of Frailty

name: Greater Scroll of the Storm Witches

description: Grants an aura which improves both the armor and attack strength of the caster and their allies.
name: Greater Scroll of the Stalwart Alliance

description: Strengthens the will of the caster, greatly improving their ability to withstand damage in battle.
name: Greater Scroll of Unbroken Fortitude

description: Grants the caster improved control over their inner powers, allowing them to use their skills more quickly and more effectively.
name: Divine Scroll of the Archmage's Fury

description: Rips the very fabric of the universe asunder, devastating all who enter its area of influence.
name: Divine Scroll of Armageddon

description: Grants the caster improved reflexes, allowing them to dodge most incoming projectiles.
name: Divine Scroll of the Arrow Dancer

description: Summons an enormous demonic beast from the netherworld.
name: Divine Scroll of the Behemoth

description: Summons the avatar of a mad god.  Although control can only be maintained for a short while, the god can wreak havoc in even this short time span.
name: Divine Scroll of the Maddened God

description: Turns the inner power of surrounding enemies against them, burning their bodies with the power of their own magic.
name: Divine Scroll of Magebane

description: Sends a devastating flurry of blades in all directions.
name: Divine Scroll of the Breaking Wheel

description: Creates a maelstrom of destructive power around the caster.
name: Divine Scroll of the Crushing Vortex
